short_summary: European SP space research station, satellite tracking, joint space project Canada Mexico, Southern East West zones
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission should be submitted by 1 December 2022 at 2:00 p.m. EST directly to the Contracting Authority.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership

: The main purpose of this contract is the management and operation of space-related resources, such as the European Space Agency, Canada and Mexico. On top of the day-to-day management, the contractors are also expected to provide special event management  such as the launch of high-profile satellites.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Space Object Tracking and Characterization

### Notice Information
- **Reference Number**: WS3725211527-Doc3751374765
- **Publication Date**: November 15, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 1, 2022, at 14:00 EST

### Notice Details
Government agencies have an exclusive right to the contract. Successful contractors will be working with the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and the Pre-award organization.

### Tender Description
Advanced contract award notice announcing the award of a contract for engineering and research and technology based services to Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC). This contract will be a joint effort between the PSPC and the pre-award organization.

### Trade Agreements
- **Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)**
- **North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)**
- **World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)**
- **Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)**
- **Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)**
- **Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement**
- **Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement**
- **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**
- **Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)**
- **Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)**
- **Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement**
- **Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)**
- **Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)**

### Regions
- All work will be conducted within Canada.

### Contact Information
- **Name**: April Campbell (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email**: [april.campbell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:april.campbell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Phone**: Not provided
- **Fax**: Not provided
